summary: 获取图片异步批量翻译的结果。

schema.description: 调用图片异步批量翻译接口获得的任务 ID

Result.description: 翻译结果，当改批量翻译任务没有执行完毕时，该字段为空数组

InPaintingUrl.description: 单张图片的译后编辑器背景图

FinalImageUrl.description: 单张图片的翻译结果图 URL

TemplateJson.description: 单张图片的译后编辑器模版数据

Code.description: 单张图片的翻译状态码

Success.description: 单张图片是否翻译成功标识

Status.description:
标识当前任务的运行状态，可能的值及含义如下：

- `created`：批量翻译任务创建成功，等待运行
- `running`：批量翻译任务正在运行中
- `finished`：批量翻译任务运行结束，图片均已翻译完毕，此时 `Result` 字段会包含每张图片的翻译结果
- `invalid`：传入的任务 ID 非法，或者任务的翻译结果已经过期被清理

103.errorMessage: An error occurred while decoding the URL. Verify that the specified URL is encoded.

105.errorMessage: The specified language pair is not supported.

106.errorMessage: An error occurred while detecting the language.

108.errorMessage: The maximum length of the specified string is exceeded.

110.errorMessage: The account has not activated the service.

112.errorMessage: Failed to call the translation service.

113.errorMessage: The service is not activated or the account has an outstanding balance.

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": 200, "Message": "OK", "RequestId": "DACD263C-C068-5116-83EC-117245AA35CF", "Data": { "Result": [ { "InPaintingUrl": "https://example.com/example.jpg", "FinalImageUrl": "https://example.com/example.jpg", "TemplateJson": "{\"TemplateJson\": \"Editor Template Json String\t\"}", "SourceImageUrl": "https://example.com/example.jpg", "Code": 200, "Message": "OK", "Success": true } ], "Status": "finished" } }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" 200 OK DACD263C-C068-5116-83EC-117245AA35CF https://example.com/example.jpg https://example.com/example.jpg {"TemplateJson": "Editor Template Json String "} https://example.com/example.jpg 200 OK true finished ","errorExample":""}]
title: 图片异步批量翻译结果获取
description:
请确保在使用该接口前，已充分了解图片翻译产品的[收费方式和价格](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/163332.html)。

图片异步批量翻译的结果，翻译完毕后，会保存 1 小时，过期后会被清理，请及时获取结果。
